alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:17PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Outflow winds produced by collapsing strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Otero, northwestern Prowers, central Kiowa and northern Bent Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 715 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow produced by collapsing strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles northwest of Eads to 7 miles south of Haswell to 8 miles east of Cheraw. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Las Animas, Eads, Wiley, Haswell, Neeoshe Reservoir, McClave, Blue Lake, Sweetwater Reservoir, Hasty, Neegronda Reservoir, Queens Reservoir, John Martin Reservoir, Caddoa and Fort Lyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
